meanings.definition: A combining form meaning “motion,” used in the formation of compound words: cinecamera.
meanings.sent1: The cine in cinecamera refers to motion.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching movies with cine elements.
meanings.sent3: The cine in cinecamera must be feeling dizzy from all the movement!
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a cine, constantly in motion and never still.
meanings.sent5: The cine in cinecamera brings the scenes to life with its motion.

meanings.definition: A combining form meaning “film,” used in the formation of compound words: cinephile.
meanings.sent1: Being a cinephile means loving everything related to film.
meanings.sent2: The cine festival showcased a variety of films.
meanings.sent3: The cinephile couldn't stop talking about the magic of movies.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a treasure trove of cine, filled with film trivia.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of cine lies in its ability to transport us to different worlds through film.
